name: Applauze, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to offer event updates and ticket booking. The company's mobile application uses data analytics and machine learning to discover and recommend relevant concerts, theater productions, sports games and community events, enabling artists to identify, understand and engage fan base.
